feed.title: Big Trout Lake - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Big Trout Lake
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Thursday 09 February 2023
